product_short_description: Powerful gaming laptop with AMD Ryzen processor and RTX graphics.
product_long_description: Experience gaming like never before with the ASUS ROG Zephyrus G14. Featuring an AMD Ryzen processor, NVIDIA RTX graphics, and a high-refresh-rate display, it's designed for gamers who demand top-tier performance.
product_highlights: 14-inch QHD display with 120Hz refresh rate for smooth gaming
AMD Ryzen 9 5900HS processor for high-speed performance
NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 or 3070 GPU for realistic graphics
16GB or 32GB RAM options for seamless multitasking
Compact and lightweight design for portability
AniMe Matrix LED display on the lid for customization

product_short_description: Ultra-slim laptop with NanoEdge display and powerful internals.
product_long_description: Boost your productivity with the ASUS ZenBook 14. With a compact design, NanoEdge display, and high-performance components, it's the ideal laptop for professionals and creatives on the go.
product_highlights: 14-inch Full HD NanoEdge display with slim bezels
Available in Intel Core i5 or i7 processors for fast performance
Intel Iris Xe or NVIDIA GeForce MX450 graphics options
16GB RAM and up to 1TB PCIe SSD for rapid data access
ErgoLift hinge for comfortable typing and better cooling
NumberPad 2.0 for enhanced productivity

product_short_description: Durable gaming laptop with AMD Ryzen processor and GTX graphics.
product_long_description: Take your gaming to the next level with the ASUS TUF Gaming A15. Built to withstand intense gaming sessions, it features an AMD Ryzen processor, NVIDIA GTX graphics, and a high-refresh-rate display.
product_highlights: 15.6-inch Full HD display with 144Hz or 240Hz refresh rate
AMD Ryzen 7 or Ryzen 9 processor for responsive gameplay
NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti or RTX 3060 graphics options
Up to 32GB RAM and 1TB SSD for rapid data access
Durable MIL-STD-810H military standard construction
RGB backlit keyboard for a customizable gaming experience

product_short_description: High-performance gaming laptop with 17-inch display and RTX graphics.
product_long_description: Dominate the battlefield with the ASUS ROG Strix Scar 17. Featuring a large 17-inch display, powerful RTX graphics, and advanced cooling, it's the ultimate gaming laptop for enthusiasts.
product_highlights: 17.3-inch Full HD or WQHD display with up to 360Hz refresh rate
Intel Core i7 or i9 processors for top-tier gaming performance
NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 or 3080 GPU for realistic visuals
Up to 64GB RAM and 2TB SSD for lightning-fast data access
Optical mechanical keyboard with per-key RGB lighting
Advanced cooling with liquid metal thermal compound

product_short_description: 27-inch gaming monitor with WQHD resolution and 165Hz refresh rate.
product_long_description: Immerse yourself in gaming with the ASUS ROG Swift PG279Q. Featuring a high-resolution display, fast refresh rate, and NVIDIA G-Sync technology, it delivers smooth and responsive gameplay.
product_highlights: 27-inch WQHD IPS display for crisp and vibrant visuals
165Hz refresh rate and 4ms response time for smooth gaming
NVIDIA G-Sync technology for tear-free and stutter-free gameplay
ASUS Eye Care technology with blue light filter and flicker-free backlight
Ultra-slim bezels for a seamless multi-monitor setup
Adjustable stand with swivel, tilt, and height adjustments

product_short_description: Tri-band gaming router with Wi-Fi 6 support and ultra-fast speeds.
product_long_description: Elevate your gaming experience with the ASUS ROG Rapture GT-AX11000. With ultra-fast Wi-Fi 6, tri-band technology, and gaming-focused features, it ensures low-latency connectivity for online gaming.
product_highlights: Tri-band 802.11ax Wi-Fi with up to 11000Mbps data rate
1.8GHz quad-core processor for fast and responsive performance
Game Accelerator feature prioritizes gaming traffic for low latency
Triple-level game acceleration with Adaptive QoS, Game Radar, and VPN Fusion
AiMesh support for creating a seamless whole-home Wi-Fi network
ROG-themed gaming dashboard for easy network management

product_short_description: Gaming smartphone with Snapdragon 888, high-refresh-rate display, and advanced gaming features.
product_long_description: Unleash the power of gaming with the ASUS ROG Phone 5. With a Qualcomm Snapdragon 888 processor, a high-refresh-rate display, and gaming-centric features, it's designed for mobile gamers who demand top-notch performance.
product_highlights: 6.78-inch AMOLED display with 144Hz refresh rate
Qualcomm Snapdragon 888 processor for flagship-level performance
Up to 16GB RAM and 256GB UFS 3.1 storage
64MP triple-camera system for versatile photography
AirTrigger 5 and ultrasonic sensors for precise gaming controls
6,000mAh battery with 65W fast charging

product_short_description: Stylish and lightweight laptop for everyday productivity.
product_long_description: Stay productive on the go with the ASUS VivoBook S15. Its sleek design, NanoEdge display, and powerful performance make it a perfect companion for work and entertainment.
product_highlights: 15.6-inch Full HD NanoEdge display with slim bezels
Available in Intel Core i5 or i7 processors for efficient multitasking
Intel UHD or NVIDIA GeForce MX250 graphics for enhanced visuals
8GB or 16GB RAM options for smooth performance
ErgoLift hinge for comfortable typing and improved cooling
Compact and lightweight design for portability

product_short_description: Powerful graphics card for high-performance gaming and content creation.
product_long_description: Experience superior graphics performance with the ASUS Dual GeForce RTX 3080. Featuring NVIDIA's latest GPU architecture, high VRAM, and advanced cooling, it's designed for enthusiasts who demand the best.
product_highlights: NVIDIA Ampere architecture for realistic graphics and AI processing
10GB GDDR6X VRAM for handling large textures and 3D models
Axial-tech fan design with dual 90mm fans for efficient cooling
Auto-Extreme Technology ensures precision manufacturing and reliability
GPU Tweak II software for intuitive performance tweaking
Supports real-time ray tracing for lifelike lighting and reflections
